description: # Cost Centers for Budgeting and Analysis While your Books of Accounts are framed to fulfill statutory requirements, you can set up Cost Center and Accounting Dimensions to address your companies reporting and budgeting requirements. Click here to learn more about how [Cost Center](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/cost-center) and [Dimensions](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/v13/user/manual/en/accounts/accounting-dimensions) allow you to get advanced financial analytics reports from ERPNext.
name: Cost Centers for Report and Budgeting
title: Cost Centers for Budgeting and Analysis
